name: fetch-profile
description: Fetches a customer profile from Tealium Moments API.

attributeId.description: The Tealium attribute ID (e.g. 5003 for email).

attributeValue.description: The value to look up (e.g. user@example.com).

properties.description: Key-value pairs of basic profile attributes

metrics.description: Numerical values such as LTV, tenure, churn risk

flags.description: Boolean indicators for product holdings and preferences
